name: SELENAUT QUEST
description:
SELENAUT OPERATION

GREETINGS CAPTAIN MATNUT, YOUR MISSION IS TO TRAVEL TO THE MOON IN A RESCUE OPERATION TO PROTECT THE LOCAL SPECIES BEFORE THEY ARE CAPTURED BY THE DROID ARMY.

YOU HAVE A PORTABLE TRACTION DEVICE TO TRANSPORT THE LUNATICS TO THE SHIP IN THE CHROMATIC ORDER ESTABLISHED BY THE I.A. PROTOCOL.

YOU MAY ENCOUNTER HOSTILE DROID RESISTANCE. YOU HAVE AUTHORIZATION FROM THE SPACE FEDERATION FOR THE USE OF FORCE WITH YOUR WEAPON OF PROTONS.

THE SYSTEM WILL ALERT YOU WHEN A LUNATIC IS BEING HIJACKED. YOU MUST RELEASE THE HOSTAGE BEFORE IT IS TELEPORTED SO IT IS RECOMMENDED TO USE THE PLANETARY RADAR TO LOCATE AND RESCUE IT AS SOON AS POSSIBLE.

USING THE JETPACK WILL ALLOW YOU TO MOVE FASTER ON THE SURFACE OF THE SATELLITE, USE IT SPARINGLY BECAUSE IT CONSUMES ENERGY FROM THE SPACESUIT.

THE ARMOR OF YOUR SPACESUIT IS PREPARED TO RECEIVE LASER IMPACTS AND PROTECT YOU FROM SMALL EXPLOSIONS, THE DAMAGE CAUSED CAN BE REPAIRED USING DROID ENERGY CELLS.
